This website was made to showcase my attempts on some analytics exercises using publicly available geospatial data; the assignments are a part of the course "IS415 Geospatial Analytics and Applications" from the Singapore Management University.

**Access the contents via the sidebar.** 

Contents overview:

1.  Home (this page)
2.  About
3.  Hands-on exercises
4.  In-class exercises

Analyses were done using R programming language. This website was crafted using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) package.
